sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-app
	id = 'homepage'>
		<v-main>
			<v-card>
				<v-card-title>homepage</v-card-title>
				<v-tabs>
					<v-tab>乘车公告</v-tab>
					<v-tab>更新日志</v-tab>
					<v-card flat text width="137">
					    <v-select
					        :items="busRouters"
					        v-model="selectBus"
					        solo
					        text
					        flat
					        style="font-size: 14px;"
					    >
					    </v-select>
					</v-card>
					<v-tab-item>
						<v-row
							justify="space-between"
						>
							<v-col 
								fluid
								class = 'column'
							>
								<v-treeview
									dense
									activatable
									color="warning"
									:items="timeSelector">
								</v-treeview>
							</v-col>
							<v-divider vertical></v-divider>
							<v-col>
								<v-card>
									<v-card-title>
										<v-text-field
										v-model="search"
										append-icon="mdi-magnify"
										label="Search"
										single-line
										hide-details
										></v-text-field>
									</v-card-title>
									<v-data-table
										:headers="headers"
										:items="notices"
										:search="search"
									></v-data-table>
								</v-card>
							</v-col>
						</v-row>
					</v-tab-item>
					<v-tab-item>
						
					</v-tab-item>
					<v-tab-item>
						
					</v-tab-item>
				</v-tabs>
			</v-card>
		</v-main>
	</v-app>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    name: 'HelloWorld',
    data(){
		var _self = this;
		return	{
			search:'',
			selectBus:'所有路线',
			busRouters:[
				'所有路线',
				'一号线',
				'二号线',
				'三号线'
			],
			headers:[
				{text:'发布时间',align:'start',value:'time'},
				{text:'标题',value:'title'},
				{text:'调整时间',value:'adjustTime'},
				{text:'修改路线、站点及方法',filterable: false,value:'adjustMethod'}
			],
			notices:[
				{
					time:'2021.1.12',
					title:'标题',
					adjustTime:'2021.1.16',
					adjustMethod:'一号线:\n\t一号站点：取消\n二号站点：新增'
				}
			],
			timeSelector : [
				{
					name:'2021',
					children:[
						{ name: '1月/January' },
						{ name: '2月/JFebruary' },
						{ name: '3月/March' },
						{ name: '4月/April' },
						{ name: '5月/May' },
						{ name: '6月/June' },
						{ name: '7月/July' },
						{ name: '8月/August' },
						{ name: '9月/September' },
						{ name: '10月/October' },
						{ name: '11月/November' },
						{ name: '12月/December' },
					]
				}	
			],
		}
	}
  }
</script>
<style>
	.column:{
		width: 154px;
	}
</style>
